title: Welcome to Rox
excerpt: We're excited to announce the launch of Rox, a lightweight ActivityPub server focused on performance and usability.
content:
TODO: Add full blog post content.

We're excited to announce the launch of Rox!

Rox is a lightweight ActivityPub server focused on performance and usability. It is designed to be compatible with Misskey clients and services.

In this post, we'll cover:
- Why we built Rox
- Our design philosophy
- What's coming next
author: Rox Team
